SIAMCAT
  • Reference

Select samples based on metadata

This functions filters features, labels, and metadata based on a specific column in the metadata. Provided with a column in the metadata and a range or a set of allowed values, the function will return the labels, metadata, and features for the samples matching the allowed range or set.

select.samples(meta, feat, label, filter, allowed.set = NULL,
  allowed.range = NULL)

Arguments

meta

metadata object
feat

features object
label

labels object
filter

name of the column from metadata on which the selection should be done
allowed.set

a vector of allowed values
allowed.range

a range of allowed values

Value

list containing values after selection:

  • $feat = features;

  • $label = labels;

  • $meta = metadata

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
